feature: Step1GridAlignment should use themed UI components
description: Refactor Step1GridAlignment screen to use the established Button, Card, and Text components from the UI library instead of raw TouchableOpacity and inline StyleSheet styles. This improves consistency, accessibility, and maintainability.

phases.name: Setup and Analysis
phases.description: Merge required UI components and analyze current implementation

subtasks.title: Merge UI component library from branch 001
subtasks.description: The UI components (Button, Card, Text, etc.) exist in branch auto-claude/001-enhance-ai-visual-pips-board-extraction-accuracy. Merge or cherry-pick the theme system and UI components into this branch to make them available for the refactoring.
subtasks.completion_notes: UI components and theme system already exist in branch. Verified: Button (primary/secondary/ghost/danger/success variants), Card (default/elevated/outlined/accent variants), Text/Heading/Body/Label components, full theme system with colors/spacing/radii/shadows/animations.
acceptance_criteria: Theme system is available with colors, spacing, radii, shadows
Button component with variants (primary, secondary, ghost) is available
Text components (Text, Heading, Body, Label) are available
Card component with variants is available
UI components can be imported from '../components/ui'
subtasks.notes: This is a prerequisite - the UI library must be available before refactoring can begin

phases.name: Replace Button Components
phases.description: Replace all TouchableOpacity-based buttons with themed Button components

subtasks.title: Replace pickButton with themed Button
subtasks.description: Replace the 'Select Image' TouchableOpacity button in the empty state with Button component using variant='primary'.
subtasks.completion_notes: Already completed. The 'Select Image' button in the empty state uses Button component with variant='primary'. Committed as e03633d.
acceptance_criteria: pickButton uses Button component with variant='primary'
Button shows 'Select Image' text via title prop
onPress handler calls onPickNewImage
Visual appearance matches theme design system
subtasks.notes: Remove pickButton and pickButtonText styles from StyleSheet

subtasks.title: Replace AI extraction button with themed Button
subtasks.description: Replace the 'Use AI to Extract Puzzle' TouchableOpacity with Button component. Use variant='primary' with a custom color or a new 'ai' variant. Handle loading state with Button's built-in loading prop.
subtasks.completion_notes: AI extraction button now uses Button component with variant='primary' and loading prop. Committed as b44f4ca.
acceptance_criteria: AI button uses Button component
Loading state uses Button's loading prop instead of inline ActivityIndicator
Disabled state handled via Button's disabled prop
Button text changes between 'Use AI to Extract Puzzle' and loading text
subtasks.notes: May need to pass loading text via title prop when loading=true, or extend Button component

subtasks.title: Replace row/col control buttons with themed Buttons
subtasks.description: Replace the +/- control buttons for rows and columns with Button components using variant='secondary' and size='small'.
subtasks.completion_notes: Row/col +/- buttons now use Button component with variant='secondary' size='small'. Removed controlButton and controlButtonText styles. Committed as 4915753.
acceptance_criteria: Control buttons use Button component with variant='secondary' size='small'
Buttons show +/âˆ’ symbols correctly
onPress handlers call handleRowChange/handleColChange with correct delta

subtasks.notes: Remove controlButton and controlButtonText styles from StyleSheet

subtasks.title: Replace newImageButton with themed Button

acceptance_criteria: newImageButton uses Button component with variant='ghost'
Button shows 'Choose Different Image' text
onPress handler calls onPickNewImage

phases.name: Replace Text Components
phases.description: Replace raw Text elements with themed typography components

subtasks.title: Replace static text with themed Text components
subtasks.description: Replace all raw RN Text elements with themed Text, Body, Label, and Heading components. Map colors like #888 to theme color='secondary'.

Cleaned up StyleSheet by removing color/fontSize properties now handled by themed components. Committed as 7a90b14.
acceptance_criteria: emptyText uses Body or Text component with color='secondary'
controlLabel uses Label component with color='secondary'
controlValue uses Body or Text component with appropriate weight
hint text uses Body size='small' with color='secondary'
aiHint uses Body size='small' with color='secondary'
confidenceTitle uses Label component with appropriate styling

phases.name: Use Card and Theme Tokens
phases.description: Wrap sections in Card components and replace hardcoded colors with theme tokens

subtasks.title: Wrap confidence section in Card component

Visual consistency with other cards in the app

subtasks.title: Replace hardcoded colors with theme tokens

All colors reference theme tokens (colors.surface.*, colors.text.*, etc.)

phases.name: Cleanup and Testing
phases.description: Remove unused styles and verify the refactored component

subtasks.title: Remove unused StyleSheet styles
subtasks.description: Clean up the StyleSheet by removing all styles that are now handled by themed components.
acceptance_criteria: Removed: pickButton, pickButtonText styles
Removed: controlButton, controlButtonText styles
Removed: newImageButton, newImageButtonText styles
Removed: aiButton, aiButtonDisabled, aiButtonLoading, aiButtonText styles
Removed: emptyText, controlLabel, controlValue, hint, aiHint styles
Removed: confidenceSection, confidenceTitle styles
Only layout and positioning styles remain in StyleSheet
subtasks.notes: Keep styles for container, content, imageContainer, image, controls, controlRow, edgeHandle, etc.

subtasks.title: Verify component functionality and appearance
subtasks.description: Test all interactive elements and verify visual appearance matches the theme design system.
acceptance_criteria: All buttons respond to press events correctly
Loading states work for AI extraction button
Row/column controls increment and decrement correctly
Text is readable with correct colors and fonts
Component renders correctly in both empty and loaded states
No TypeScript errors or warnings
subtasks.notes: Manual testing or snapshot tests if available

final_acceptance: No direct usage of TouchableOpacity for buttons
No inline text styling - all text uses themed Text components
No hardcoded color values - all colors from theme tokens
Component functionality is preserved (image selection, grid controls, AI extraction, cell tapping)
Visual appearance is consistent with app design system
